## Properties

| Property            | Attribute            | Description                                                | Type          | Default                    |
| ------------------- | -------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- | -------------------------- |

| `selectedFramework` | `selected-framework` | What framework is initally selected                        | `string`      | `this.frameworks[0].value` |
